volunteering.summary: Host a youth care group at my home every 2nd and 4th Friday of the month.
responsibilities: Facilitate regular youth care group gatherings
Provide a safe and welcoming environment for participants
Support relational and spiritual growth within the group

volunteering.role: Operations & Security in the Children's Ministry
volunteering.summary: Supported operational and security processes for children's ministry services.
responsibilities: Ensured children were properly checked in before class and checked out after class
Managed parents and children during peak periods
Troubleshot technical issues with registration devices
